title: Muhammad Ali and Civil Rights Heroes - a Collection
description:
Muhammad Ali and Civil Rights Heroes - a Collection:

This upload is a tribute to Muhammad Ali who passed away on June 3, 2016. We have 35 titles here..

-  Ali & Ali - The Soul of a Butterfly; Reflections on Life's Journey (2004)

-  Ali & Durham - The Greatest; My Own Story (1975)

-  Ambar - Malcolm X at Oxford Union; Racial Politics in a Global Era (2014)

-  Bausum - Marching to the Mountaintop (2012)

-  Berkow - Counter Punch; Ali, Tyson, the Brown Bomber, and Other Stories of the Boxing Ring (2014)

-  Brand - Mandela; My Prisoner, My Friend (2014)

-  Breitman (Ed.) - Malcolm X Speaks; Selected Speeches and Statements (1965)

-  Burrow - Extremist for Love; Martin Luther King Jr., Man of Ideas and Nonviolent Social Action (2014)

-  Carson & Shepard (Eds.) - A Call for Conscience; the Landmark Speeches of Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr. (2001)

-  Dreier - The 100 Greatest Americans of the 20th Century; a Social Justice Hall of Fame (2012)

-  Edozie & Stokes (Eds.) - Malcolm X's Michigan Worldview; an Exemplar of Contemporary Black Studies (2015)

-  Ezra - Muhammad Ali; the Making of an American Icon (2009)

-  Fry - The American South and the Vietnam War; Belligerence, Protest, and Agony in Dixie (2015)

-  Hansen - The Dream; Martin Luther King, Jr., and the Speech That Inspired a Nation (2003)

-  Hauser - Muhammad Ali; a Tribute to the Greatest (2016)

-  Hauser - Muhammad Ali; His Life and Times (1991)

-  Helfand - Muhammad Ali; the King of the Ring (2011)

-  Jakoubek - Martin Luther King, Jr.; Civil Rights Leader (2005)

-  Kane - The Politics of Moral Capital (2004)

-  Kendall - Nelson Mandela; a Life Inspired (2014)

-  Miller - Approaching Ali; a Reclamation in Three Acts (2016)

-  Muhammad Ali - The Black Scholar Interviews, The Black Scholar, Vol. 1, No. 8 (June 1970) pp. 32-39

-  Owens - Muhammad Ali; Boxing Champ & Role Model (2011)

-  Posner - Killing the Dream; James Earl Ray and the Assassination of Martin Luther King, Jr. (1998)

-  Reed - The Complete Muhammad Ali (2015)

-  Remnick - King of the World; Muhammad Ali and the Rise of an American Hero (1998)

-  Rieder - Gospel of Freedom; Martin Luther King, JR.'s Letter from Birmingham Jail .. (2013)

-  Roberts & Smith - Blood Brothers; the Fatal Friendship between Muhammad Ali and Malcolm X (2016)

-  Rummel - Malcolm X; Militant Black Leader (2005)

-  Rummel - Muhammad Ali; Heavyweight Champion (2005)

-  Shanahan - Running with the Champ; My Forty-Year Friendship with Muhammad Ali (2016)

-  Sports Illustrated - 13 June 2016

-  Sundquist - King's Dream (2009)

-  Winter & Roca - Muhammad Ali; Champion of the World (2007)

-  Zirin - What's My Name, Fool; Sports and Resistance in the United States (2005)
